meta.article_title: October 23, 2023 - POP Opponents with the Power Of Placement

causes_communes: Failing to develop instinctive habit of when to go to each spot

debutant.placement: Play all three spots (wide forehand, wide backhand, and middle)

exercices_complementaires.description: Go as wide as possible to the opponent's forehand; never give an easy ball.
Attack the wide backhand and middle, rarely go to forehand unless it's an ace.
Play the middle, a smaller target that moves; takes practice to develop.

metriques_progression: Regular match play for about a year
erreurs_a_eviter: Going back to the same spot twice, which can be exploited
